title: Urban Conservation and Regeneration
description:
This module will equip students with a comprehensive understanding of the key theoretical debates, challenges, and practices of urban conservation and regeneration. In addition to examining the architectural issues, the module
will also investigate the social, economic and environmental problems which have resulted in current Asian urban and suburban landscapes, and how government policy can affect change to these landscapes for urban and economic renewal. By exploring exemplary examples mainly from Asia, students will critically discuss
the suitability, significance, and strategies employed to tackle emerging urban conservation and regeneration issues and challenges faced in the region.
